title: Patch 5.3 to 5.4 update bug
body:
Patch update gets to 99% then a message pops up saying 'an unspecified error has occurred, please check the logs for more information.' Therefore the update cannot be complete. Please Help.

Thanks

replies.body:
Yes I have the same error Im trying 4 hours to fix it nothing I cant do so far .
I have partially repatched now I forced it to repatch the whole release .
Lets see what happens ...
Yep, I've got exactly this problem :/, in fact I'll post one myself.
Have you tried restarting the client yet?
